overview:
James Warren is the Technology and QA Director at MCD (www.mcdpartners.com).

I’m James Warren and I’ve produced significant web and mobile projects (average of US$1 to 2 million per year) consisting of teams (15 to 40 individuals) composed of project managers, content developers, creative directors, engineers, information architects, strategists, database architects, quality assurance analysts and media planners. My industry experience includes media (e.g., HBO, AETN, Samsung), retail (e.g., Tiffany & Co.), telecommunications (e.g., AT&T Business), financial services (e.g., Discover Financial Services, Capital One Financial, GE Capital), distillation (e.g., Seagram) and pharmaceutical (e.g., GlaxoSmithKline). I’ve managed all project aspects inclusive of staff, quality, time and budget (i.e., revenue generation) while keeping staff employee turnover to less than 7%.

relationships.title: Director of Technology and Quality Assurance
